name: Ignition
overview:
Ignition is a marketing communications and PR firm specializing in technology.

Ignition provides marketing expertise and solutions and serving as the “virtual marketing VP” to technology companies small and large in United States, Canada and Europe. Services include but are not limited to, marketing strategy development, writing and editing (case studies, whitepapers, brochures, datasheets, web content), public relations programs, design, go to market planning and marketing campaigns for demand generation. Co-founder Ellyn Winters also serves as the in-house communications advisor to the Accelerator Centre, an internationally recognized technology incubator located in Waterloo, Ontario, Canada.
